n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter n:"))
a=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  a[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
countOfElements=function(x){
  count=0
  for(i in 1:n){
    if(a[i]<=x)
      count=count+1
  }
  return(count)
}
x=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the number:"))
print(countOfElements(x))
